name: War Sheeps
description:
Take part in the eternal confrontation of War Sheeps with frends! To win, You just need to trample your opponent into the mud, and a little eagle accuracy.

Battle in beautiful completely destructible arenas!
Cute cartoon sheep are waiting for your orders.

TWO GAME MODES:

  • VS mode: 2 players, play with you friends offline.
  • CPU mode: play versus cpu!

When creating the game, not one sheep was harmed.
